20.eng-name: The Book on Vows and Oaths
20.ara-name: كتاب النذور والأيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Do not vow, for the vows does not prevent what is decreed at all, and it only causes the miser to spend (of his wealth)
